revised_title: The Role of Growth Substance in Plant Development
tldr: This article investigates the mechanism of action of the growth substance in plants, specifically in coleoptiles. The researchers found that the movement of growth substance is polar, with it passing to the lower side and increasing growth, causing upward curvature. The substance is thermostable, lipoid-soluble, and has a high molecular weight. It is active in very high dilutions, and its effects on plant growth are studied using automatic motion picture cameras.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Plant Biology
